content.description: All eukaryotic cells contain at least one Golgi complex, typically located in the cytoplasm and near the endoplasmic reticulum.
content.question: Which of the following best describes a process that occurs within the Golgi complex?

choices.label: Enzymatic modification of newly synthesized integral membrane proteins
Synthesis of cytosolic proteins based on the nucleotide sequences of <math alttext="m R N A's" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mtext>mRNAs</mtext></mstyle></math>
Degradation of proteins by hydrolytic enzymes contained within the complex
Synthesis of various types of lipids

content.answer: Enzymatic modification of newly synthesized integral membrane proteins
